name: AVSpeechUtterance
desc: An object that encapsulates the text for speech synthesis and parameters that affect the speech.

items.name: init(string: String)
items.desc: Creates an utterance with the text string that you specify for the speech synthesizer to speak.

items.name: init(attributedString: NSAttributedString)
items.desc: Creates an utterance with the attributed text string that you specify for the speech synthesizer to speak.

items.name: let AVSpeechSynthesisIPANotationAttribute: String
items.desc: A string that contains International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) symbols the speech synthesizer uses to control pronunciation of certain words or phrases.

items.name: var voice: AVSpeechSynthesisVoice?
items.desc: The voice the speech synthesizer uses when speaking the utterance.

items.name: var pitchMultiplier: Float
items.desc: The baseline pitch the speech synthesizer uses when speaking the utterance.

items.name: var volume: Float
items.desc: The volume the speech synthesizer uses when speaking the utterance.

items.name: var prefersAssistiveTechnologySettings: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that specifies whether assistive technology settings take precedence over the property values of this utterance.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: The rate the speech synthesizer uses when speaking the utterance.

items.name: let AVSpeechUtteranceMinimumSpeechRate: Float
items.desc: The minimum rate the speech synthesizer uses when speaking an utterance.

items.name: let AVSpeechUtteranceMaximumSpeechRate: Float
items.desc: The maximum rate the speech synthesizer uses when speaking an utterance.

items.name: let AVSpeechUtteranceDefaultSpeechRate: Float
items.desc: The default rate the speech synthesizer uses when speaking an utterance.

items.name: var preUtteranceDelay: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time the speech synthesizer pauses before speaking the utterance.

items.name: var postUtteranceDelay: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time the speech synthesizer pauses after speaking an utterance before handling the next utterance in the queue.

items.name: var speechString: String
items.desc: A string that contains the text for speech synthesis.

items.name: var attributedSpeechString: NSAttributedString
items.desc: An attributed string that contains the text for speech synthesis.
